pkgmetadata.longdescription: Alice is an educational software used to teach programming, game programming, and 3D animation. Alice comes with 3D models. Models may be arranged in a what you see is what you get (WYSIWYG) virtual reality space. Programming of 3D model behavior done using drag and drop in a Java like syntax.

Installs the NetBeans plugin. You still need to install the plugin manually.
